# CSApi.ICollectOptions.Validate method

Check whether the parameters are sensible

```csharp
public IEnumerable<string> Validate(bool afterPreparation)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| afterPreparation | Whether the prepare phase has been run and a `AltCover.Recorder.g.dll` should exist. |

## Return Value

Any errors that would be reported to the command line
